title: Construction costs for selected airports up to 2012
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in billion euros for 6 number of Airports.
Airport Hong Kong (China) has the highest Costs in billion euros and Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) has the lowest Costs in billion euros.
The highest Airport Hong Kong (China) has 12.9 more Costs in billion euros than the lowest Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Airport in the x axis and Costs in billion euros in the y axis.
The Costs in billion euros is highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in billion euros for 6 number of Airports.
Airport Hong Kong (China) has the highest Costs in billion euros and Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) has the lowest Costs in billion euros.
The highest Airport Hong Kong (China) has 12.9 more Costs in billion euros than the lowest Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Airport in the x axis and Costs in billion euros in the y axis.
Airport Hong Kong (China) has the highest Costs in billion euros and Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) has the lowest Costs in billion euros.
Second maximum Costs in billion euros is found at Airport Kansai/Osaka (Japan).
There is a difference of 12.9 between the maximum Airport Hong Kong (China) and minimum Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
Costs in billion euros at Airport Hong Kong (China) is 15.9 , second place is Kansai/Osaka (Japan) at 15.9, and thirdly is Doha (Katar) at 8.8.
Airport Hong Kong (China), and Kansai/Osaka (Japan) share the same value 15.9.
The lowest value 3.0 at Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) is almost 1.7 times smaller than the average value 9.35.
The Costs in billion euros is 56.1 if we add up values of all Airports.
